ovdesc.p: This screen is used to define different message payment types in the payments hub.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPT.MSGPAYMENTTYPE

desc.p: Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
